burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa

Interface DifferentiableStateValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ParametricFunction, ParametricFunction.ParametricStateFunction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearFVVFA, LinearVFA

    public interface DifferentiableStateValue
extends ParametricFunction.ParametricStateFunction
    An extension of ParametricFunction.ParametricStateFunction that that is differentiable.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan.
